Room.Name: Kaldeas' Mansion Foyer
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the front entry and foyer of the Kaldeas Mansion.
Room.LongDescription: The room is opulent and rich, but dusty, as though it had not been used for a very long time. Mirrors hang at odd angles, and there are a number of doors along the hallway. Mardic Kaldeas was known as a master of illusion, and everything you see behind those doors may not be exactly as they appear.
